thread.title: Rays outfielder Colby Rasmus shaved his embarrassing beard after the internet roasted him | For The Win
thread.title_full: Rays outfielder Colby Rasmus shaved his embarrassing beard after the internet roasted him | For The Win

author: Andrew Joseph
title: Rays outfielder Colby Rasmus shaved his embarrassing beard after the internet roasted him | For The Win
text:
Rays outfielder Colby Rasmus shaved his embarrassing beard after the internet roasted him Rays outfielder Colby Rasmus shaved his embarrassing beard after the internet roasted him By Andrew Joseph February 22, 2017 5:41 pm Follow @andyj0seph 727 shares 
Rays outfielder Colby Rasmus showed off some unique facial hair when he arrived at Rays spring training camp last week. 
He even took his official Rays photo with that insane beard on his face. 
— Josh Shiaman (@TSNJoshShiaman) February 22, 2017 
Rasmus has rocked a different hairstyle with every team he’s played for. In Houston, for example, he stopped getting haircuts. But it was time for a change at his latest stop in Tampa. That change, though, was not a good one, and the internet let Rasmus hear about it. “Wow you could not possibly look any more gross” 
Colby Rasmus: hold my beer pic.twitter.com/IxvBtLqCXl 
— Pete Blackburn (@PeteBlackburn) February 22, 2017 I thought I'd seen that Colby Rasmus pic before… pic.twitter.com/mk5u6MRhLJ 
— Ross Villarreal (@SportsRV) February 22, 2017 Colby Rasmus out here looking like Mose Schrute pic.twitter.com/Xo1sE1ATJM 
— Grant Goldberg (@GrantGoldberg) February 22, 2017 Colby Rasmus is part of an impressive blood line of center fielders. #BlueJays pic.twitter.com/CVOJ4Bxhmg 
— Daniel Valente (@StatsGuyDaniel) February 22, 2017 BREAKING: Colby Rasmus has joined the Wyatt Family. pic.twitter.com/9tZ9REsTEA
